title: Gwyneth Paltrow wishes 'absolute gem' Dakota Johnson a happy birthday
text:
Dakota has celebrated her 30th birthday (Picture: Getty Images/Instagram)

Gwyneth Paltrow has paid tribute to the ‘absolute gem’ that is Dakota Johnson on her 30th birthday.

As Dakota has celebrated hitting 30, she has had a flurry of celebrities’ wish her well on her big day, and Gwyneth is just the latest addition.

The 47–year-old took to Instagram to share a picture of Dakota cuddling up to a dog, as she said: ‘Happy 30th birthday to this absolute gem’, while also adding a heart emoji.

Many fans praised Gwyneth’s post, adding it was a ‘sweet’ thing to do.

‘What a super sweet thing to say,’ one fan said.

‘YOU are a gem @gwynethpaltrow!’ another commented. ‘Changing all the ex rules.

‘More power to you!!!’

‘It’ so lovely that you all get along,’ another fan added.

Gwyneth shared this snap of Dakota cuddling up to a dog (Picture: Instagram)

Dakota has notably been dating Gwyneth’s ex-husband, Coldplay frontman Chris Martin, for some time now, but that hasn’t stopped the two from becoming great pals.

The actresses previously holidayed with their respective partners together at the beach in New York’s Hamptons in August, and even hung out together at the Avengers: Endgame premiere back in April.

Gwyneth and Dakota previously hung out together at the Avengers: Endgame premiere back in April (Picture: Instagram)

And last November, the entire Paltrow-Martin family reportedly spent Thanksgiving with the Fifty Shades Of Grey star, according to a source from People.

‘They’re a total modern family and had a great time celebrating together,’ the source claimed.

Gwyneth also reportedly ‘pushed’ ex-husband Chris to reunite with Dakota, after the two allegedly ‘split’ earlier in the year.

‘Gwyneth is the one who pushed him to do it,’ a source told Us Weekly. ‘Gwyneth is happy if Chris is happy, she only wants the best for him.

Gwyneth and Chris were married for 10 years, before calling it quits on their relationship in 2014. Together they have two children – 15-year-old Apple, and 12-year-old Moses.

Dakota has been dating the rocker since October 2017.
